attributes.action: Increase the price of food in the House of Commons to cover all cost plus 50%
attributes.additional_details: Thousands of people are struggling with the cost of living yet MPs enjoy subsidized meals.
attributes.background: Pay a fair rate for food when people are starving

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/622377

Your petition refers to a fair price, but then suggests that you want prices to be set at a rate that allows for costs plus 50% to be recovered. It's also not clear how you want any additional monies to be allocated, if it's possible for catering venues to operate with prices consistent with this rule.
